content:
Dear @RalfJ,

The standard library test suite is failing under Miri. Would you mind investigating this issue?

Thanks in advance!
Sincerely,
The Miri Cronjobs Bot
This is const_allocate not implemented in Miri... the implementation should be the same as for runtime, which however seemingly for some reason does not abort? That seems odd. Cc @oli

ah lol, there is a test_const_allocate_at_runtime. ;)
why doesnt that just abort/panic?
Well... returning a null pointer is a bit more lightweight of a signalling strategy. We can adjust once this is used for more than testing purposes
its also a signal that is rather easily lost, though
